resources.string: Please answer a few questions to get started!
How many hours do you spend using a DAW in one month?
Considering the following two EQs, which one has the higher Q-factor?
What corresponds to doubling the acoustic pressure? A change by ...
The reverberation time describes the intervall within the acoustic pressure drops to the ... part of its original value.
What corresponds to the distance between the early reflections within a room impulse response?
A signal with a constant level of -20 db passes a compressor with ratio 1:3 and a threshold of -10 db. How will the level change?
Please rate your agreement with these statements!
It helps me be more productive.
It saves me time when i use it.
I can use it successfully every time.
I learned to use it quickly.
It is easy to learn to use it.
I easily remember how to use it.
I feel I need to have it.
